column4: theadmin: grub uses UUIDs by default. Nothing should need to be changed.
ActionParsnip Here is my original question - http://pastebin.com/xfBq95jU - I'm trying if setting UUIDs in grub configuration files helps
Again, grub already uses UUIDs by default. I don't know what you plan to change, but at least make sure you know how to undo it.
